innhold.avsnitt: You can also combine the parental benefit with work. You can choose between:

liste.punkt: working full-time and delaying you parental benefit period
working part-time and extending your parental benefit period

innhold.avsnitt: If you work part-time, the parental benefit is reduced according to how much you work. At the same time, your parental benefit period will be extended. You can only work with one employer at a time.
If you wish to spend your parental benefit periods at the same time, the coverage can not exceed more than 100 percent in total. Remember that both parents must apply.
